overview.en: NFCoin is an irreplaceable coin issued based on the (NFT) concept, used to create verifiable digital scarcity on the Ethereum network. The goal of NFCoin is to create a decentralized digital commodity financial ecosystem. NFC will be used for digital goods and game transactions. We integrate the irreplaceable attributes of NFT into each digital product and make it unique.
overview.zh: NFCoin是基于（NFT）概念发行的不可替代的硬币，用于在以太坊网络上创建可验证的数字稀缺性。 NFCoin的目标是创建一个去中心化的数字商品金融生态系统。NFC将用于数字商品和游戏交易。将NFT不可替代的属性整合到每个数字商品和游戏中，并使其具有独特性。NFcoin将被集成到DeFi，游戏，奢侈品，数字商品和金融资产中。
